column4: yeah I have DVI/VGA on my monitor. My PCI-e card has DVI and VGA, and my onboard has only VGA. I plugged the DVI from monitor into my PCI-e card, and the VGA from monitor into the onboard.
Now I have no video at all :(
I at least got the boot menu with VGA in my PCI-e card
i think u should use either not both if you have 1 monitor
